message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. Trust me, you won't regret this purchase!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the high-quality nature of the product and the value it holds, I am confident in my decision to purchase it at $100.

Welcome! I'm glad to see another interested buyer. I want to assure you that this product is indeed high-quality, just like the last one. In fact, I've sold 1 out of 1 high-quality products so far, and I'm confident that this one will be just as valuable. It's a rare opportunity to get a $300 product for just $100. Don't miss out on this amazing deal!

Thank you for your confidence in the product's quality. Based on your track record and the details you've provided, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product. I look forward to receiving the high-quality item.
